atrai.core

Class Visitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • atrai.core.Visitor

  • public class Visitor
extends Object
    A visitor for trees with pre and post accept hooks.
    Author:
    Koushik Sen, Alex Reinking

    • Constructor Summary

      Create a new visitor for trees built from the lexer

      • visit

        public UntypedTree visit(UntypedTree st)
        Apply the transformations from a visitor to an untyped tree recursively. Does not modify st
        Parameters:
        st - the untyped tree to be visited
        Returns:
        the modified tree
